Verna:
You know that the Isle of Souls has become a danger zone due to Mother Nornil's defense system, right? At the heart of that system is a weapon devised by Mimir, the greatest scientist of the Age of Giants.
It's a Spicula prototype, created long before the Metusela Kamaels of today. It has no soul, and exists only to destroy; once a target is set, it will attack relentlessly until the target is dead.
All we Kamaels know today is that there is a mysterious entity, a spear aimed at the gods.
